oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crowd of onlookers at opening of Tennessee Theatre, 1952 February 28
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of crowd of onlookers who thronged Church Street watching the arrival of movie stars and local VIPS at the gala opening of the Tennessee Theatre February 28, 1952 in downtown Nashville, Tennessee. Outside activities included broadcasts by WSIX radio and WSM television, a concert by the American Legion Post 5 band, and the arrival of the honored guests, each with an individual police escort. Each star was introduced to the crowd from a street platform before entering the building. Banner caption announced "New Theater Opens With All The Glamour of Hollywood" on the next day story. Forms part of the Nashville Banner Archives. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee Theatre (Nashville, Tenn.); Sudekum Building (Nashville, Tenn.); Barton's (Nashville, Tenn.); Nashville Shirt Shops (Nashville, Tenn.)
